summary: Completed comprehensive translation updates for English, Russian, and Turkmen across all website pages. Added missing translations for hardcoded text including Hero buttons, Footer content, Contact page sections, About page certificates/milestones, and Gallery elements. Updated all components to use translation keys instead of hardcoded text. Verified grammar, spelling, and professional business language in all three languages. All pages now fully translated and professional.
current_status: All translations complete. Website fully multilingual with professional business translations in English, Russian, and Turkmen. All hardcoded text replaced with translation keys. Ready for production use.
